description: A snake stands before an audience of other snakes, utilizing a pointer and a diagram on a screen to deliver a lesson. The diagram illustrates a human leg, contrasting a bare lower leg labeled "NO good" with a leg wearing a boot labeled "ok". This surreal scene depicts snakes conducting a strategic seminar on effective biting locations, ironically reversing the typical predator-prey dynamic and highlighting the absurdity of animals adopting human-like educational methods for predatory purposes. The presentation focuses on the tactical advantage of avoiding boots when targeting human prey.

other_text.location: on screen above leg in boot
on screen pointing to bare leg
